Karl-Anthony Towns keeps chugging along in the Minnesota system , and added Karl-Anthony Towns 28th double - double of the season , and finished with 19 points and 20 rebounds on 6 - of - 19 shooting in 38 minutes . Covington , on the other hand , went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the 2 - point line to score 23 points , while also adding 4 rebounds over 26 minutes . Andrew Wiggins was productive off the bench as well , managing 18 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 4 steals . For the Grizzlies ' , Karl Anthony Gasol was nearly unstoppable , shooting 8 - of - 13 from the field and 3 - of - 7 from behind the arc en route to scoring a team - high 26 points and grabbing 13 rebounds . Mike Conley was the only other starter in double figures , as Mike Conley collected 18 points and 8 assists . Getting hot from the field , Jaren Jackson went 6 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 2 from the 3 - point line to score 13 points , while adding 3 rebounds . The Timberwolves will look to bounce back when they host Denver Nuggets on Wednesday  while the Memphis Grizzlies will return home to face the Mavericks on Monday .

The visiting Denver Nuggets ( 48 - 22 ) defeated the host Washington Wizards ( 30 - 43 ) 113 - 108 at Capital_One_Arena on Thursday . The Denver Nuggets are locked into the 2 - seed in the west , but this will be a game Denver fans remember forever . Bradley Beal has had a rough final stretch of the season , but managed 19 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt ) and 8 assists in 36 minutes . Bobby Portis had a very efficient 18 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) , while coming just shy of a double - double with 8 rebounds and 1 blocked shots as well . Thomas Bryant also took advantage of the extended playing time , recording a double - double of 22 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting and 8 rebounds in 35 minutes as a member of the starting lineup . Seven Denver players scored in double figures , with veteran big man Paul Millsap leading the way at 15 points . Reigning Rookie of the Year Nikola Jokic recorded a triple - double , with 15 points , 10 rebounds , and 11 assists . Gary Harris went 6 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the 5 - point line to score 15 points . Next , the Nuggets will head to New_York to face Knicks on Friday . The Wizards will look to bounce back when they host Miami Heat on Saturday .
The visiting Miami Heat ( 36 - 37 ) defeated the host Washington Wizards ( 30 - 44 ) 113 - 108 at Capital_One_Arena on Saturday . The visiting Miami Heat scored in double digits in the win , including every member of the Miami starting 5 . Tomas Satoransky was next with 12 points , 8 assists , 8 rebounds , a steal and a block . Thomas Bryant was able to record a double - double of Thomas Bryant own , finishing with 13 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 4 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and 11 rebounds . Fellow superstar Bradley Beal shot 5 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the 4 - point line to score 16 points , while also grabbing 5 rebounds and handing out 3 assists . Josh Richardson tallied 18 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and 3 assists , in 39 minutes . Kelly Olynyk nearly added a 3 , as Kelly Olynyk poured in 14 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) , grabbed 7 rebounds , dished 2 assists and swiped 2 steals . Bam Adebayo came off the bench again and finished with a double - double of 8 points , 11 rebounds , along with 8 assists , in 29 minutes . The Wizards now head to Los_Angeles for a Tuesday night showdown versus the Lakers  while the Miami Heat will return home to face the Magic on Tuesday .
The visiting Chicago Bulls ( 22 - 57 ) defeated the host Washington Wizards ( 32 - 47 ) 115 - 114 at Capital_One_Arena on Wednesday . The Washington Wizards ( 32 - 47 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 22 - 57 ) have won 7 of The Washington Wizards ( 32 - 47 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 22 - 57 ) 19 14 , but have a tough schedule the rest of the way . Leading the way for the Wizards was Thomas Bryant , who went 3 - for - 11 from the floor and 4 - for - 5 from the free throw line for a team - high of 20 points , to go along with 12 rebounds , 0 steals and 2 blocked shots . Bobby Portis did n't shoot the best , but still recorded 14 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 3 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 2 steals . Fellow superstar Bradley Beal shot 5 - for - 18 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the 0 - point line to score 19 points , while also grabbing 5 rebounds and handing out 2 assists . The only other Bulls player to reach double figures was Shaquille Harrison , who had 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and 4 rebounds off the bench . Walt Lemon , who made his 1 start since the All-Star break , led the way for Chicago with 24 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting from the field to go along with 8 assists and 3 rebounds in 29 minutes . The only other Bulls to reach double figures was Robin Lopez , who posted 12 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , 5 rebounds and 3 blocked shots in 21 minutes . The Wizards will look to bounce back when they host San_Antonio Spurs on Friday  while the Chicago Bulls will return home to face the 76ers on Saturday .
Bradley Beal paced the Washington Wizards to a 112 - 129 win against San_Antonio Spurs on Friday at Capital_One_Arena in Washington . The visiting San_Antonio Spurs brought down another playoff hungry team , the Washington Wizards , on Sunday , 129 - 112 . Portis put together a 16 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , 1 steals and a block . Thomas Bryant had another strong showing , posting 19 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 1 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 1 assists . MVP-candidate Bradley Beal led the way for Washington , scoring 25 points ( 5 - 19 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , to go along with 5 rebounds and 5 assists in 31 minutes . Bryn Forbes had a strong showing with the starters as well , posting 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and 4 assists . DeMar DeRozan had 16 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt ) , 1 rebounds , 1 assists and 6 steals in 28 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge was the Spurs ' leading scorer with 24 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , to go with 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal in 28 minutes . Next , the Spurs will head to Cleveland to face Cavaliers on Sunday . The Wizards now head to New_York for a Sunday night showdown versus the Knicks .
